mapper.sql: SELECT I.SUBMERID,I.SUBMERNAME,I.STATE,I.OPERATOR,I.MODLOCK,I.MODTIME FROM UMPAY.T_SECMER_INF I #if( $operator && $operator!='' ) ,UMPAY.T_HFMER_OPER O #end WHERE 1=1 #if( $operator && $operator!='' ) AND O.MER_ID=I.SUBMERID AND O.STATE=2 AND O.OPERATOR=:operator #end #if( $subMerId && $subMerId!='' ) AND I.SUBMERID=:subMerId #end #if( $subMerName && $subMerName!='' ) AND I.SUBMERNAME like '%$subMerName%' #end #if( $state && $state!='' ) AND I.STATE=:state #end ORDER BY I.MODTIME DESC

SELECT i.SUBMERID,i.SUBMERNAME,i.STATE,i.OPERATOR,i.MODTIME,c.INFUNCODE,c.ORDERURL,c.NOTIFYURL FROM UMPAY.T_SECMER_INF i FULL JOIN UMPAY.T_SECMER_CNF c ON i.SUBMERID=c.SUBMERID #if( $operator && $operator!='' ) JOIN UMPAY.T_HFMER_OPER O ON i.SUBMERID=O.MER_ID #end WHERE 1=1 #if( $operator && $operator!='' ) AND O.STATE=2 AND O.OPERATOR=:operator #end #if( $subMerId && $subMerId!='' ) AND i.SUBMERID=:subMerId #end #if( $subMerName && $subMerName!='' ) AND i.SUBMERNAME like '%$subMerName%' #end #if( $state && $state!='' ) AND i.STATE=:state #end ORDER BY i.MODTIME DESC
